column2: Activities
Supporting Export of agricultural crops
Identification of farmers and conducting basic awareness on cultivation of export agriculture crops
Make initial arrangements with DEA to supply plants.
Supply and distribution of plants (Coffee, Pepper, Vanilla, Clove, Ginger)
Conducting awareness quality improvement and minimizing post-harvest losses
Monitoring and supervision
Supporting paddy cultivation
Identification and signing of MoU with selected farmers
Conducting basic awareness of the “Parachute method.”
Arranging of farmers contribution (50% of the cost)
Supply and distribution of seed planting trays
Monitoring and supervision
Implementation of protected agricultural methods (polytunnel)
Identification and signing of MoU with selected farmers
Conduct awareness on protected agriculture
Arranging of farmer contribution (50% of the cost)
Supply and distributions of polytunnel
Monitoring and supervision
Supporting fruit cultivation (Banna, Mango, Avocado)
Identification farmers and conducting basic awareness on cultivation
Land preparation for cultivation
Supply and distributions of fruit plants to the farmers
Monitoring and supervision
Supporting animal husbandry
Identification and signing of MOU with selected farmers
Conducting basic awareness programs
Supply and providing of suitable animals - Cows, Goat, Chicks
Providing support to the construction of sheds, Sheds - cow, Sheds – goat
Monitoring and supervision
